title: 求助
author: scp1983
txt_content:
我安装Java时它安装失败，弹出的窗口上的内容大致是这样的：Download failed:
from=https://javadl.oracle.com/webapps/download/GetFile/1.8.0_231 -b11/5b13a193868b4bf28bcb45c792fce896/windows-i586/jre1.8.0_ 231full.msi,to=C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\LocalLowi\Oracle\avaVjre1.8.0_ 231\jre1.8.0 _231full.msi
怎么解决？

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
直接使用离线安装包
https://javadl.oracle.com/webapp ... 33b84d0e960903adac8
